Description:
"Vibe coding" is about letting an AI tool build your product for you, but the secret to success is giving it the right context. In this video, we explain why a Product Requirements Document (PRD) isn't "too technical," but is actually the key to getting great results, even for non-technical users.

#AI #GitHubCopilot #VibeCoding

About GitHub It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Title: How to get the most out of your AI with vibe coding
Author: GitHub
